laws.statute_citation: Maine Revised Statutes Title 26 ยง 599-A
requirements: Non-competes PROHIBITED for most employees

Maine prohibits non-compete agreements except: (1) employees above 400% of federal poverty level (~$60,000/year for individual), (2) agreement disclosed before offer or 3 weeks notice given, (3) legitimate business interest, (4) 1 year maximum duration.
Action required: Remove OR ensure: salary >$60k, pre-offer disclosure, 1-year limit
Can only use if: salary >$60k, disclosed before offer, 1 year max, legitimate interest
laws.notes: Maine prohibits non-compete agreements except: (1) employees above 400% of federal poverty level (~$60,000/year for individual), (2) agreement disclosed before offer or 3 weeks notice given, (3) legitimate business interest, (4) 1 year maximum duration.
